long_description: An everyday favorite, the men's Cannondale Team 71 Bike Jersey is made from recycled polyester and wicks away sweat like nobody's business. Re-spun, recycled fibers feel soft and wick moisture. Offers UPF 40 sun protection from harmful UV rays. Water-resistant zippered pocket plus 3 traditional pockets stow your essentials. Cannondale Team 71 Bike Jersey for men features a semi-fitted cut.
short_description: An everyday favorite, the men's Cannondale Team 71 Bike Jersey is made from recycled polyester and wicks away sweat like nobody's business.
